bookSourceComment: 原有的基础上去除登录，感谢大佬的token
exploreUrl:
<js>
//分类 category
let categoryList = [
	{
		title: "都市激情",
		type: "都市激情"
	},
	{
		title: "校园春色",
		type: "校园春色"
	},
	{
		title: "乡村爱情",
		type: "乡村爱情"
	},
	{
		title: "系统异能",
		type: "系统异能"
	},
	{
		title: "家庭乱伦",
		type: "家庭乱伦"
	},
	{
		title: "穿越重生",
		type: "穿越重生"
	},
	{
		title: "经典武侠",
		type: "经典武侠"
	},
	{
		title: "同人改编",
		type: "同人改编"
	},
	{
		title: "科学幻想",
		type: "科学幻想"
	},
	{
		title: "东方玄幻",
		type: "东方玄幻"
	},
	{
		title: "娱乐明星",
		type: "娱乐明星"
	},
	{
		title: "历史架空",
		type: "历史架空"
	},
	{
		title: "西方魔幻",
		type: "西方魔幻"
	},
	{
		title: "贤者小说",
		type: "贤者小说"
	},
]
//状态 finished
let statusList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ""
	},
	{
		title: '已完结',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '连载中',
		type: 0
	}
]
//篇幅 space
let spaceList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ''
	},
	{
		title: '短篇',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '中篇',
		type: 2
	},
	{
		title: '长篇',
		type: 3
	}
]

let list = [];
formatUrl = (space, category, finished) => {
	return `/api/novel/app/novel/search?category=${category}&finished=${finished}&space=${space}&excludeTags={{getExcludeTags();}}&size=40&page={{page}}`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (spaceItem of spaceList) {
	pushItem(`篇幅（${spaceItem.title}）`, "", 1);
	for (categoryItem of categoryList) {
		statusList[0].title = categoryItem.title;
		for (statusItem of statusList) {
			pushItem(`${statusItem.title}`, formatUrl(spaceItem.type,categoryItem.type,statusItem.type), 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.authors
ruleBookInfo.name: $.title
